channel.title: Home on Daniel Dulaney
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Daniel Dulaney

item.title: AppendList in Rust, part 2: Optimizing the layout
item.description: At the end of part 1, we had just about finished implementing AppendList, an array of arrays that let you push new elements on through an immutable reference.

item.title: Sidestepping the borrow-checker
item.description: Rust’s borrow checker is a powerful tool. It makes sure your code is safe by enforcing two rules, but they end up having a massive impact on program design.
